snippet.title: Saltsea Chronicles - Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Saltsea Chronicles is a new story-driven adventure game from the award-winning indie studio Die Gute Fabrik (Mutazione, Sportsfriends). 

FIND OUT MORE: https://www.saltseachronicles.com/
STEAM https://store.steampowered.com/app/1419620/Saltsea_Chronicles/
PLAYSTATION https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/concept/10007906
NINTENDO SWITCH https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/saltsea-chronicles-switch/
ITCH.IO https://gutefabrik.itch.io/

CONNECT:

Linktree: https://linktr.ee/gutefabrik
Website: https://gutefabrik.com/
Instagram: https://instagram.com/gutefabrik
Twitter: https://twitter.com/gutefabrik
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@gutefabrik
